formattedAddress: 992 Columbus Ave, New York, NY 10025, USA
adrFormatAddress: 992 Columbus Ave, New York, NY 10025-2501, USA

originalText.text: Dr Shirley will tell you what you need to hear and what is best for the health of your teeth and gums long term. The staff is very friendly and Dr. Shirley leverages tech in a very smart way to make your visits very efficient. If you are looking for a guardian Angel for your teeth look no further.

text.text: Dr Shirley will tell you what you need to hear and what is best for the health of your teeth and gums long term. The staff is very friendly and Dr. Shirley leverages tech in a very smart way to make your visits very efficient. If you are looking for a guardian Angel for your teeth look no further.

originalText.text: I can’t rate them a 10+ because this rating system only allows 5 stars. My daughter needed to see a dentist immediately. Wisdom tooth was in extreme pain. She was fit in for an appointment for the same day!!! The office manager Ana went above and beyond to provide exceptional service while booking the consultation, to giving step by step instructions as to what the process was.  Then assisting in helping me to set up an appointment with an oral surgeon. Dr. Benjamin Shirley was AMAZING!! He was so thorough and explained everything to my daughter. I will and have recommended this office to my friends and family.  Thank you

originalText.text: Dr. Shirley is the example of a good dentist. He’s professional, knowledgeable, and caring. I would highly recommend.

text.text: Dr. Shirley is the example of a good dentist. He’s professional, knowledgeable, and caring. I would highly recommend.

originalText.text: I’ve been going to Dr. Shirley for several years now and he’s a terrific dentist. He and his staff are super friendly, professional and knowledgeable. He’s one of the best dentists I’ve been to; very highly recommended!
